metadata.title: CVE-2017-8825 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A null dereference vulnerability has been found in the MIME handlingcomponent of LibEtPan before 1.8, as used in MailCore and MailCore 2. Acrash can occur in low-level/imf/mailimf.c during a failed parse of a Ccheader containing multiple e-mail addresses.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8825` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libetpan20 - 1.8.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libetpan package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.0-1').
